select t.actorId, t.actorName, MAX(CASE WHEN t.type = 'TOTAL' then t.number else 0 END) as totalCount, MAX(CASE WHEN t.type = 'READY' then t.number else 0 END) as readyCount, MAX(CASE WHEN t.type = 'EXECUTING' then t.number else 0 END) as executingCount, MAX(CASE WHEN t.type = 'FINISHED' then t.number else 0 END) as finishedCount from ( -- 待操作 SELECT su.id AS actorId, su.realName AS actorName, 'TOTAL' as type, count(st.id) as number FROM sys_users su LEFT JOIN sys_users_roles sur ON sur.USER_ID = su.ID LEFT JOIN sys_roles sr ON sr.id = sur.ROLE_ID left join sys_task st on st.EXECUTOR_ID = su.id and st.TASK_STATUS IN (0,1,2) WHERE sr.ROLE = #{roleType} group by su.id
UNION ALL -- 待操作 SELECT su.id AS actorId, su.realName AS actorName, 'READY' as type, count(st.id) as number FROM sys_users su LEFT JOIN sys_users_roles sur ON sur.USER_ID = su.ID LEFT JOIN sys_roles sr ON sr.id = sur.ROLE_ID left join sys_task st on st.EXECUTOR_ID = su.id and st.TASK_STATUS=0 WHERE sr.ROLE = #{roleType} group by su.id
union alL -- 操作中 SELECT su.id AS actorId, su.realName AS actorName, 'EXECUTING' as type, count(st.id) as number FROM sys_users su LEFT JOIN sys_users_roles sur ON sur.USER_ID = su.ID LEFT JOIN sys_roles sr ON sr.id = sur.ROLE_ID left join sys_task st on st.EXECUTOR_ID = su.id and st.TASK_STATUS=1 WHERE sr.ROLE = #{roleType} group by su.id
union all -- 已完成 SELECT su.id AS actorId, su.realName AS actorName, 'FINISHED' as type, count(st.id) as number FROM sys_users su LEFT JOIN sys_users_roles sur ON sur.USER_ID = su.ID LEFT JOIN sys_roles sr ON sr.id = sur.ROLE_ID left join sys_task st on st.EXECUTOR_ID = su.id and st.TASK_STATUS=2 WHERE sr.ROLE = #{roleType} group by su.id ) t group by actorId
